title: Fifth-Year Options Picked Up & Declined from 2017 Draft
itunes:title: Fifth-Year Options Picked Up & Declined from 2017 Draft
description:
Bucky Brooks and Rhett Lewis are back with a new episode. To start off, the guys react to the passing of the NFL's winningest coach Don Shula (:53). Next, the pair look at how new Cowboys quarterback Andy Dalton fits with the team (5:52). Then, the duo do a deep dive on which notable fifth-year option players had their option picked up or declined from the first round of the 2017 NFL Draft (10:48).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
